content: I have a value set that has a ton of SNOMED codes that I was given from my analysts. There are a bunch of the codes that I have no idea where they got them from. Unfortunately, the Publisher only reports the first invalid code that it finds as opposed to listing all of them. It would be great if the QA report listed all of the invalid codes.
I expected it would list all of them. can you set it up so I can reproduce?
just pushed sample Value sets into fhir-med-list-guidance for you to reproduce
this should be fixed next release. Btw, you should commit the txCache files
